anomaly_random: The anomaly seemed to peform its events in an unpredictable manner when activated.
interaction_anger: When the anomaly was physically interacted with, the entropic stability around the anomaly was noticeably lowered.
grant_language: When %NAME% read the book, they began speaking the same unknown language that the book is written in.
unknown_lang: The book is written in a language that top language experts could not identify.
